title: Patient-reported vision impairment in low luminance relates to visual function in age ... - Nature

summary.text: **KEY FINDING**: 67% of participants completed vision impairment assessments, improving data quality.
**TACTICAL WIN [ROADMAP]**: Integrate automated reminders to enhance patient adherence in future studies.
